title: Quiz - CurrentTap - ESI - 8th to 15th November 2022
instruction: The ___________ Tourism has bagged the prestigious Responsible Tourism Global award at the World Travel Mart held recently (Nov 2022) in London. The award was given for the STREET project. The 'street' initiative is a water protection and conservation project in Tourism sector implemented with public participation. The project aims to deepen the canals and various waterbodies and clean them for the purpose of tourism activities, the tourism department said.

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Union Minister for Health and Family Welfare has agreed to host the Stop TB Partnership’s 36th Board meeting in March 2023, in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh. The Stop TB Partnership’ Secretariat is hosted and administered by which of the following organizations?
options: United Nations Development Programme
World Health Organization
United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS)
Global Tuberculosis Institute
McGill International TB Centre

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the 16th Asian Conference on Diarrhoeal Disease and Nutrition (ASCODD) has been held in Kolkata, West Bengal. It has been organized by which of the following organizations/institutes?
options: ICMR-National Centre for Diseases Informatics and Research
ICMR-Regional Medical Research Centre
ICMR-Vector Control Research Centre
ICMR-National Institute of Cholera and Enteric Diseases
ICMR-National Institute of Virology

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), National Workshop on ‘Localization of Sustainable Development Goals in Gram Panchayats’ has been organized in Kochi, Kerala on which of the following themes?
options: Theme 1: Poverty Free and Enhanced Livelihood Gram Panchayats
Theme 3: Child-Friendly village
Theme 4: Water Sufficient village
1 and 2
2 and 3

quiz.text: Ministry of Panchayat Raj, Government of India has adopted thematic approach to SDGs. The approach aims to localize SDGs in rural areas through PRIs, especially Gram Panchayats by clubbing ___________ Sustainable Development Goals adopted by United Nations into ‘____________Themes’.
options: 17; 7
17; 9
15; 5
15; 6
17; 6

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Employee Provident Fund Organization (EPFO) has released the EPFO Vision @ 2047 document. As per the findings in the document, which of the following states/UTs has the highest absolute number of working age population covered by EPFO?
options: Delhi
Karnataka
Maharashtra
Tamil Nadu
Uttar Pradesh

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Government of ________ has announced to organize ‘Purple Fest-Celebrating Diversity’ in January 2023. It is a first of its kind inclusive festival to embrace & celebrate persons with disabilities.
options: Delhi
Kerala
Goa
Tamil Nadu
Sikkim

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), 7th edition of India Water Week (1st to 5th November) has been inaugurated by the President of India in Uttar Pradesh. Which of the following is the theme of the 7th IWW?
options: Water Conservation for Future
Water Cooperation – Coping with 21st century challenges
Water and Energy for Inclusive Growth
Water Security for Sustainable Development and Equity
Water for All: Striving Together

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of the participating countries at the 7th India Water Week?
options: Denmark
Norway
Finland
Germany
Israel

quiz.text: According to the latest data released by the Ministry of Finance, the GST collection for October 2022 stood at Rs 1.52 trillion (16.6% year-on-year increase), second highest monthly collection since the implementation of GST on 1 July, 2017. Highest GST monthly collection was recorded in April 2022, of ____________.
options: Rs 1.68 trillion
Rs 1.54 trillion
Rs 1.76 trillion
Rs 1.89 trillion
Rs 1.59 trillion

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), a Constitution Bench of the Supreme Court (SC) upheld the validity of the 103rd Constitutional Amendment. 103rd Constitutional (Amendment) Act 2019, amended which of the following article(s) of the constitution?
options: Article 21
Article 15
Article 14
Article 28
Article 44

quiz.text: 103rd Constitutional Amendment provides for 10% reservation in government jobs and educational institutions to the ‘economically weaker sections’ of the society. Which of the following eligibility criteria for EWS reservation is/are not mentioned correctly?
options: Family income should be below Rs 8 lakhs
Agriculture land should be less than 10 acres
Residential area should be less than 1000 square feet
Only a person from general category can avail the benefits of reservation
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Government of _________ has observed Mandia Divas (Millet Day) on 10th November 2022 to promote millets as a highly nutritive and eco-friendly food product. The state government has announced to spend Rs 2,800 crores in five years towards the Millets Mission.
options: Andhra Pradesh
Chhattisgarh
Rajasthan
Odisha
Telangana

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Ministry of Home Affairs has declared Census, NPR (National Population Register) database as Critical Information Infrastructure. Ministry of Home Affairs has taken the decision after exercising the powers conferred to it under which of the following acts?
options: Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019
Information Technology Act, 2000
Census Act, 1948
1 and 3
2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) has held a special meet to draft report to send to Central Government for missing inflation target. Report will be sent to the Government by the RBI under the provisions of Section____________ of the RBI Act, 1934.
options: 42A
34B
45ZN
3
21A

quiz.text: Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) was constituted under Section 45ZB of the Reserve Bank of India Act, 1934. MPC was constituted in which of the following years?
options: 2016
2012
2017
2018
2008

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Government of India has amended Aadhaar rules. As per new rules, supporting documents need to be updated at least once in ____________.
options: 8 years
5 years
10 years
12 years
15 years

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), it was informed that, so far, Self Reliant India (SRI) Fund has committed over 50% of its corpus to 38 daughter funds for investment in MSMEs in a year since its launch. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to SRI fund?
options: SRIF is setup under the aegis of Ministry of MSME.
SBICAP Ventures Limited is the investment manager of the fund.
It is a Category II Alternative Investment Fund.
SRIF has a ‘Mother Fund-Daughter Fund’ structure.
Mother fund invests up to 40% of the overall corpus into MSME.

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), President of India has launched a portal in Bhubaneswar. The portal hosts engineering courses and books which are available in 12 scheduled Indian languages. Which of the following is the name of the portal?
options: e-Saksharta
e-Shikha
e-KUMBH
e-Vidya
e-Learning

quiz.text: _________ portal will provide engineering courses and books in 12 scheduled Indian languages. Which of the following is not one of the 12 scheduled languages?
options: Tamil
Bodo
Bengali
Punjabi
Urdu

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the union government has released two installments of tax devolution to State Governments amounting to Rs. 1,16,665 crores as per the recommendation of 15th Finance Commission. 15th FC was constituted under which of the following articles of the constitution?
options: Article 290
Article 310
Article 260
Article 280
Article 320

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, G20 represents around ___________ of the global GDP.
options: 85%
79%
72%
90%
68%

quiz.text: Which of the following countries form the current G20 troika?
options: United Kingdom, Italy and India
Italy, Indonesia and India
Indonesia, United Arab Emirates and India
Indonesia, Saudi Arabia and India
UAE, Italy and India

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the National Minorities Development & Finance Corporation (NMDFC) has been accorded a rating of A (Outlook: Stable) by CARE Ratings Pvt. Ltd. NMDFC was established in which of the following years?
options: 2015
2008
2004
1999
1994

quiz.text: The ‘XYZ’ program described in the paragraph was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2022
2020
2017
2021
2019

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the ‘XYZ’ programme?

A. It was launched by Indo-German Science & Technology Centre (IGSTC).

B. There is an age limit of 40 years for women to apply under the programme.

C. The programme has a tenure of 3 years or till completion of project whichever is later.
options: A and B
B only
A only
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Employees’ State Insurance Corporation’s (ESIC) has launched the ESIC Online Maternity Benefit Claim Portal. Payment at the rate of ____________ percent of wages is paid for 26 weeks as maternity benefit to the insured woman by ESIC to compensate for the loss of income during the period.
options: 100
50
75
60
80

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Mangrove Alliance for Climate (MAC) initiative has been launched on the side-lines COP27 at Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt. This initiative has been launched by Indonesia and ______________.
options: India
Bangladesh
Australia
United Arab Emirates
Egypt

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of the partners in the ‘Mangrove Alliance for Climate’ initiative?
options: India
Malaysia
Japan
Sri Lanka
Spain

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the India US CEO (Chief Executive Officer) forum discussed the ways to further strengthen economic ties between the two countries. As per data of 2021-22, India had a trade _________ of __________ with United States of America.
options: Surplus; USD 76.11 billion
Deficit; USD 32.8 billion
Surplus; USD 43.31 billion
Deficit; USD 43.31 billion
Surplus; USD 32.8 billion

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Hon'ble Vice President of India has attended the 19th ASEAN India Commemorative Summit and the 17th East Asia Summit in which of the following countries?
options: Vietnam
Cambodia
Malaysia
Indonesia
Laos

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), an additional contribution of USD 5 million to the ASEAN India S&T Development Fund (AISTDF) has been announced by India. A dedicated AISTDF with an equivalent amount of ___________ was established jointly by the Ministry of External Affairs and Department of Science and Technology (DST) in 2008.
options: USD 1 million
USD 500,000
USD 2 million
USD 2.5 million
USD 5 million

quiz.text:
Recently (Nov 2022), the amendment in the revised consolidated Guidelines & Standards for Charging Infrastructure for Electric Vehicles has been issued by the Ministry of Power. Which of the following amendments is /are correctly mentioned?

A. The public charging stations shall have the feature of prepaid collection of service charges.

B. A committee under Central Electricity Authority (CEA) will recommend the ceiling limit of service charges.

C. But, the Committee will not recommend "time of the day rate" for service charges.
options: A and C
B and C
A and B
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Stage 2 of ‘Transport 4All Challenge’ consists of which of the following?
options: Scaling up the solution
Pilot Testing
Solution Generation
Problem Identification and Solution Generation
Solution Generation and Pilot Testing

quiz.text: Which of the following organizations/institutes is the knowledge partner of Transport 4All Challenge?
options: Startup India
World Bank
The Institute for Transportation and Development Policy (ITDP)
City Innovation Exchange
Association of State Road Transport Undertaking (ASRTU)

quiz.text:
Recently (Nov 2022), the ‘XYZ’ has concluded a Master Risk Participation Agreement with South Africa based FirstRand Bank (FRB) to support trade transactions. The agreement was signed under ‘XYZ’s Trade Assistance Programme.

Identify ‘XYZ’ in the above paragraph from among the following options:
options: EXIM Bank
World Bank
Asian Development Bank
Reserve Bank of India
State Bank of India

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, the ___________ Tourism has bagged the prestigious Responsible Tourism Global award at the World Travel Mart held recently (Nov 2022) in London for ‘STREET Project’.
options: Gujarat
Rajasthan
Madhya Pradesh
Sikkim
Kerala

quiz.text: What does the first ‘S’ in STREET stands for?
options: Startup
Sustainable
Safe
Secure
Smart
